attributes.action: MPs who break the law should have sentences doubled and without parole.
attributes.additional_details: I strongly believe that any person who voluntarily puts themselves into a position of being able to make the law in the UK by becoming an MP should, if they break the laws of the land, be handed a sentence which is at least double that which a common voter would receive.  By signing this petition MPs can clearly demonstrate their commitment to honesty in the Peoples Parliment, after all it is not a club!
